title: Entrance Examination System with Chatbot Integration and SMS and Email Notification
technology: Laravel, Vue.js, Tailwind CSS, Laravel BotMan, Twilio, SMTP
description: Developed a dynamic web-based entrance exam platform for Cavite State University as academic requirement, using Laravel for the backend and Vue.js for reactive frontend components
Integrated Laravel BotMan chatbot to guide users through the application and examination process, answering FAQs in real-time
Implemented SMS alerts using Twilio and email notifications via SMTP, automating schedule updates, and exam results
Designed a modern, fully responsive UI using Tailwind CSS, ensuring a seamless experience across mobile and desktop devices
Key features included timed exams, randomized questions, real-time scoring, and admin dashboards for managing examinees and reports

title: Student Information Management System
technology: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, MySQL, Bootstrap
description: Built a web-based system to manage student records, including personal information, and guardian contacts
Implemented CRUD functionality (Create, Read, Update, Delete) for managing student profiles and admin accounts
Designed user-friendly interfaces using Bootstrap, enabling responsive and mobile-compatible layouts
Integrated form validation and server-side input sanitization for secure data entry
Developed features for admin login, student profile updates using alerts and modals

title: Portfolio Created using React JS
description: Developed a responsive profile application using React JS for dynamic UI rendering.
Styled with Bootstrap for a clean, mobile-first layout
Integrated Iconify to provide scalable, customizable icons
Implemented Animate on Scroll (AOS) for smooth, engaging scroll-based animations

title: Little Lemon Website
technology: React JS, Next JS Tailwind CSS
description: Capstone project for the Meta Front-End Developer certification
Built using React.js, Next.js 13 App Router, and Tailwind CSS for modern performance and responsiveness
Implements a responsive landing page, booking system, and menu interface with dynamic content loading
Utilizes Context API and useReducer for global state management (e.g., booking form, cart system)
Includes features like localStorage persistence, toast notifications, modal popups, and category filters
Incorporates third-party libraries such as Iconify for icons and Framer Motion for animations

title: Memeify - Meme Generator
description: Interactive meme generator application built with React
Allows users to create custom memes with text overlays on popular meme templates
Features drag-and-drop functionality for image uploads and real-time text preview
Responsive design ensures compatibility across desktop and mobile devices

title: Yummify - Recipe Finder
description: Recipe discovery application that helps users find recipes based on available ingredients
Integrates with external recipe APIs to provide comprehensive recipe database
Features search functionality, dietary filters, and step-by-step cooking instructions
Clean and intuitive interface designed for easy navigation and recipe management

title: Tenzies - Dice Game
description: Interactive dice game implementation based on the popular Tenzies game
Features real-time dice rolling, score tracking, and win condition detection
Includes animations for dice rolling and selection states
Responsive design optimized for both desktop and mobile gameplay
